naslov: Blato - luksuzna kuća (323 m2) + VRT + 2 PARKIRNA MJESTA (iznajmljivanje)
Lokacija: Grad Zagreb, Novi Zagreb - Zapad, Blato
opis: Agencija Zagreb4U predstavlja modernu kuću (323 m2) u Novom Zagrebu, Blatu. Kuća je dvojni objekt, kompletno ograđena od susjedne kuće. U odličnom je stanju. Gradnja je vrhunska i kvalitetna. LOKACIJA: naselje Blato je miran zagrebački kvart smješten u jugozapadnom dijelu grada, blizu naselja Lanište i Remetinec. Dio je gradske četvrti Novi Zagreb – zapad. U zadnje vrijeme se sve više razvija. Kvart ima nekoliko manjih dućana, kafića i lokalnih sadržaja. Najbliži trgovački centar ja Arena, do koje automobilom treba cca 5 minuta vožnje. Privlačnim za stanovanje čini ga blizina glavnih prometnica, Jadranska avenija i autocesta prema moru. Jedna autobusna linija vodi do Savskog mosta, gdje se može presjesti na tramvaj. KUĆA SE SASTOJI OD: - PODRUM: 2 velike prostorije (2 x 35 m2), sauna, kotlovnica, ostava, WC. - PRIZEMLJE: spavaća soba s kupaonicom, dnevni boravak, kuhinja, blagovaonica, WC, terasa, hodnik i vrt. - KAT: 3 spavaće sobe, mali dnevni boravak, pomoćna prostorija - praonica / ostava, mali balkon i lođa. - TAVANSKI PROSTOR: prostorija (50 m2) pogodna za ostavu / spremište. NAMJEŠTAJ I OPREMA: kuća je kompletno namještena. U kuhinji se nalaze: aparati Miele, uz dodatne aparate - parnu pećnicu, indukcijska ploča, hladnjak za pića/vino. Dvorišni prostor je u potpunosti uređen zelenilom te automatskim sustavom za navodnjavanje. KUĆA JE NAMIJENJENA ZA: obitelji ili tvrtke s malom fluktuacijom ljudi. 2 PARKIRNA MJESTA nalaze se u dvorištu kuće. VIRTUALNA ŠETNJA: https://www.360.zagreb4u.com/3253/ UOBIČAJENI UVJETI NAJMA: * Ugovor na rok od minimalno godinu dana * Plaćanje: 1 mjesec unaprijed * Sigurnosni polog: 1 mjesečne najamnine AGENCIJSKA PROVIZIJA OD NAJMOPRIMCA: 1 MJESEČNA NAJAMNINA + PDV ----------------------------------------------------------------- The agency Zagreb4U presents a modern house (323 m2) in Novi Zagreb, Blato. The house is a semi-detached building, completely fenced off from the neighboring house. It is in excellent condition. The construction is great and of high quality. LOCATION: Blato is a quiet Zagreb neighborhood located in the southwestern part of the city, near the Laniste and Remetinec neighborhoods. It is part of the New Zagreb – west district. It has been developing more and more recently. The neighborhood has several small shops, cafes and local amenities. The nearest shopping center is Arena, which is about a 5-minute drive away by car. Blato is attractive for living due to its proximity to major roads, Jadranska avenija and the highway to the sea. One bus line leads to the Sava Bridge, where you can change to a tram. THE HOUSE CONSISTS OF: - BASEMENT: 2 large rooms (2 x 35 m2), sauna, boiler room, storage room, toilet. - GROUND FLOOR: bedroom with bathroom, living room, kitchen, dining room, toilet, terrace, corridor and garden. - FLOOR: 3 bedrooms, small living room, utility room - laundry / storeroom, small balcony and loggia. - ATTIC SPACE: room (50 m2) suitable for storage. FURNITURE AND EQUIPMENT: the house is fully furnished. The kitchen has: Miele appliances, with additional appliances - steam oven, induction hob, drinks/wine refrigerator. The yard is fully landscaped with greenery and an automatic irrigation system. THE HOUSE IS INTENDED FOR: families or companies with low turnover. 2 PARKING SPACES are located in the yard of the house. VIRTUAL TOUR: https://www.360.zagreb4u.com/3253/ USUAL ​​TERMS OF RENT: * Contract for a minimum period of one year * Payment: 1 month in advance * Security deposit: 1 month rent AGENCY FEE FROM LESSEE: 1 MONTHLY RENT + VAT
